name: Strange Investigations: Two for Solitaire - Collector's Edition
summary:
An investigation into a fellow detective’s death uncovers details of his last case – and now Dana may be the next target!

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Find a hidden inheritance in the bonus game
- Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games to earn achievements
- Complete jigsaw puzzles and unlock a secret room
- Enjoy exclusive wallpapers and music
- Unravel the mystery with the help of an official strategy guide
